column2: ENGLISH
Inspect Army
Inspects the army, counting the number of troops that Elector Counts can provide state.
Cast Heal
Attempt to manipulate Hysh to heal the people from injuries and illness.
Banish Daemon
Use White Wind of Magic to banish the Daemon from the body of a person.
A character possessed by the Daemon must be in reach.
Summon Blizzard
Summon a blizzard to slow march of your enemies.
Raise Ice Walls
Raises an ice wall from the ground.
Cast Biting Wind
Unleash an icestorm and biting winds upon your enemies.
Ice walls cannot be raised in province holdings.
Dark Magic
Attempt to cast Dark Magic spells.
Lore of Fire
Attempt to manipulate Aqushy, the Red Wind of Magic.
Raise an army of Undead
Performs a ritual of great power raising an undead legion.
Cast Wind of Death
Summons the Wind of Death which sucks the life from the the living in area.
Requires enormous magical power and hundreds of Human corpses. Province must be controlled by character.
Requires tremendous magical power. Will kill large amount of population - cannot be used in the same province twice. Province must be controlled by character.
Open the spellbook.
Shows the available spells.
Close the spellbook.
Closes the spellbook.

Reveal yourself as a Chaos worshipper.
Fight against Chaos!
Join the holy war against Chaos forces that are trespassing in your lands.
Requires Chaos army trespassing in your lands.
Call for help against forces of Chaos.
Sends a call for help to every ruler of forces of Order.
